name: Alexander Hipp
description: I am so glad that I bought this camera. I was waiting for almost a year and got it eventually for 46k. If you are a beginner, kit lens will do.

name: Alex Suprun
description: Best camera no doubt but facing problems to attach old lens because M mount adapter required to attach lens.

name: Christopher Campbell
description: Amazing picture quality...Canon colour science is always amazing...Anyone that is looking for a compact camera should buy it. 15-45mm gives you good results but consider buying an canon adapter then you can choose from a wide canon EF and EF-S lense which opens a whole new possibility to capture incredible results.

name: Julian Wan
description: Awesome camera, one of the best mirrorless camera within budget, 18-150 lense is also superb, picture quality is good and as it is all touch screen it is easy to adjust the controls in manual Mode and it will help the newbie photographers who is switching from mobile to DSLR. One can blindly buy this and learn photography.

name: Jurica KoletiÄ‡
description: If you want to buy this camera, you may probably like to spend around 20-30k more to buy some entry-level full frame mirrorless like a7ii or RP or Z5. Spending this much for an apsc camera is not justified when you can get a full frame with kit lens within 80k. Good luck!

name: Joseph Gonzalez
description: The camera is lit!!! But don't buy 18-45 mm unless you already have Canon lenses. 18-150 mm is a pro level lens with image stabilization, it's heavier but definitely worth it.

name: Luis Villasmil
description: Product is very nice, but when I try to register it in Canon website for warranty purpose it was showed me this product is already registered, I think someone ordered this product, used it for few days & returned it, for this reason I got 6 months less warranty on product, I raised a case with flipkart they are looking into this.

name: Artem Beliaikin
description: works better than expected. it's handy. great quality pictures. great touch screen response. easy to understand.. if you want an SLR and the size of a SLR camera scares you.. this is your camera then
